pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bound Constrained Optimal Sample Allocation // Implements bound constrained optimal sample allocation (BCOSA) framework described in Bulus Dong (2019) doi:10.1080/00220973.2019.1636197 for power analysis of multilevel regression discontinuity designs (MRDDs) and multilevel randomized trials (MRTs) with continuous outcomes. Separate tools for statistical power and minimum detectable effect size computations are provided.
